modName: the Uber Compensator - Lore Friendly Gift Edition
summary: A gift mod. Adds a pair of swords for people who feel the need to overcompensate.
descriptionHtml:
A gift mod. Adds a pair of swords for people who feel the need to overcompensate.

I hid a pair of badass Dual Sided Swords in Windhelm. Ooh, these swords have killing written all over them! Just like their hiding spot!

For Kevin.
author: Wes Lesley - the Benevolent Bystander
